QuestData.Title: Operation: Surprise Party
QuestData.Description: There weren't many survivors of the Warsong attack. The few remaining rangari have gone up to one of the bluffs overlooking Telaar.$B$BThe rangari are waiting for you. They're planning a surprise counter-attack.$B$BMy copter's taken a beating. The auto-pilot's set to take you up there. I think she's got one last trip in her.$B$BMaybe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Thaelin's Copter to get up to the Rangari Overlook.
QuestData.RewardText: We've been expecting you, commander.$B$BThe situation is grim, but doable with your help.
